name: Loco Stoko
description:
Loco Stoko is a game about a train that is Out of Control! Use your quick reflexes to quickly lay track before your train crashes.

The brakes have gone out and it's your job to direct the builders how to finish the track in time to avoid a catastrophe! Feed the red or blue furnace to make red or blue smoke to communicate in code what kind of track you want built next. Scare sheep off the track, build bridges across rivers, enjoy the home-made sound effects in this action packed train laying adventure.

The game may be a bit difficult, you can use Page Up to skip through levels if you want to see the whole game.

Controls:

Z - Red Smoke Signal

X - Blue Smoke Signal

Enter - Complete Signal (lay track)

Left Click (Optional): On Blue and Red Furnaces and Conductor instead of keyboard controls

R - Reset

Mouse Position on Window: Move view around

Page Up - Skip Level

Shift - Speed up train (like x10 speed, use at your own risk)

Installation:

1. Download the zip

2. Unpack into a folder

3. Run oalinst.exe to install the OpenAL redistributable for audio to work properly

4. Run vc_redist.x64.exe to install the C++ Runtime Redistributable

5. Run LocoStoko.exe and enjoy!

The game also has support for loading new levels made with the Princess Castle Quest level editor. Let us know if you want to try and make more levels for the game and we will show you how to make them.
